Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2008 03:55PM jadio wrote: Hi Sweetpea,   I couldn't tell you why the scans didn't show up the lump- it might be because your breast tissue is dense because you're young, or any number of reasons - it seems to be a bit of a pattern where doctors miss things for any number of reasons!  Personally I would see the surgeon, if only to reassure myself (and get rid of a lump which is causing pain and irritating me!) but that doesn't necessarily mean it's the right thing to do! I am a similar age to you and have JUST (today) been finally referred for a scan by my frankly useless doctor. I really hope my results come back more conclusive! it must be so annoying for you!
Posts.Title: What to do? Sweetpea4071 stillrusty
